actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to phase out the Federal estate and gift taxes and the tax on generation-skipping transfers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce by one third the Federal estate and gift taxes in 1982 and in 1983 and repeal such taxes after 1983. Repeals the tax on generation-skipping transfers after 1983.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to phase out the Federal estate and gift taxes and the tax on generation-skipping transfers.
